about_the_game:
Bryan Scott, son of the famous and late archaeologist John W. Scott, receives a small package from the Middle East in which he finds a diary of the missing treasure hunter Kate Williams.
It turns out that she is searching for the legendary treasure of the Queen of Sheba, mentioned in the second book of Kings in the Bible. Bryan travels to the Middle East shortly thereafter, not entirely by choice, to follow Kate's trail and find her. After all, his father had been searching for this treasure for many years, but without success. Bryan has long seen no purpose in life, but now he has the opportunity to continue his father's work and rediscover his life's work.
Shortly after his arrival in the Middle East, his trail leads him to the secret society "The Black Fist", which is also in search of the legendary treasure of Queen Saba. A daring adventure full of riddles and dark secrets begins!

Game content


  • multiple playable characters
  • hand drawn high resolution backgrounds
  • traditional frame-by-frame animation
  • atmospheric orchestral soundtrack
  • easy to use 1-click interface
  • fully voiced in English and German
  • subtitles in German, English, Spanish, Italian, French, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese and Russian
  • including voices from Rolf Saxon & Alexander Schottky, known from the Broken Sword Series
